long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
# Clawde Plus: Develop, Refactor and Download All Your Snippets In A Project Zip! A WithSeismic Product.

Clawde Plus is the ultimate Chrome extension for developers leveraging AI in their projects. Download your Clawde snippets as complete projects with just one click!

## Key Features:
- **Instant Project Download**: No more copy-pasting! Download your Clawde-generated code as a ready-to-use project.
- **Intelligent Project Structure**: Clawde Plus understands your project structure and creates files you can use immediately. Just paste 
- **Credit Management**: Set desktop reminders for when you're out of Clawde credits or have reached your quota, and want reminding when they're back.

Pro Tips:
- Use in combo with the VS Code extension 'Copy Text of Selected Files' to seamlessly bounce between IDE and Claude with all the context needed. (https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=iyulab.copy-text-selected-files)

Finding typing too slow? Why not try Promptheus 2 and use your voice to talk to Claude / ChatGPT. Download Link Here: https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/promptheus-2-talk-to-chat/lakijjobifmojfjlbnhbhbjmpinncpkh

## Benefits:
- Refactor and scaffold projects quickly
- Understand your codebase effortlessly
- Accelerate your development process
- Seamlessly integrate Clawde AI into your workflow

Perfect for developers looking to move fast and overcome common AI integration bottlenecks.

Join our Discord community to build more together! https://discord.gg/enwjQNn6yS
